mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `tb_chat` t WHERE t.`is_deleted` = 0 AND t.`user_id` = #{userId} AND t.`unread` > 0

SELECT t.`id`, t.`user_id` AS userId, t.`friend_id` AS friendId, t.`chat_time` AS chatTime, t.`chat_detail_id` AS chatDetailId, t.`unread` FROM `tb_chat` t WHERE t.`is_deleted` = 0 AND t.`user_id` = #{userId} ORDER BY t.`chat_time` DESC, t.`id` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT t.`id`, t.`user_id` AS userId, t.`friend_id` AS friendId, t.`chat_time` AS chatTime, t.`chat_detail_id` AS chatDetailId, t.`unread` FROM `tb_chat` t WHERE t.`is_deleted` = 0 AND t.`user_id` = #{userId} AND t.`friend_id` = #{friendId}
